ack.p: For sharing the survey with their audiences, we thank the Fédération des producteurs acéricoles du Québec and the NYS Maple Producers’ Association, the maple producers’ forums MapleTrader.com, Lessucriers.com, and Sugarbush.info, and the paper journals Maple News and Maple Digest. We also thank Yves Bois (ACER center) and Paul Rouillard (Fédération des producteurs acéricoles du Québec) for their useful comments on the project. Finally we thank Erick Lachapelle for his comments on the survey questions.
